name: testdouble
description: A minimal test double library for TDD with JavaScript

scripts.clean: rm -rf generated dist lib .coverage && npm run clean:dist
scripts.compile: npm run compile:node && npm run compile:test && npm run compile:browser
scripts.test:cover:run: EXTRA_MOCHA_ARGS="--reporter mocha-istanbul" COVER=.coverage/lib ISTANBUL_REPORT_DIR=.coverage ISTANBUL_REPORTERS=lcov,html npm run test
scripts.test:cover: npm run compile:node && npm run test:cover:instrument && npm run test:cover:run
scripts.test:example:webpack: cd examples/webpack && npm i && npm test & cd ../..
scripts.test:example:node: cd examples/node && npm i && npm test && cd ../..
scripts.test:example:lineman: cd examples/lineman && npm i && npm test && cd ../..
scripts.test:example:babel: cd examples/babel && npm i && npm test && cd ../..
scripts.test:example: npm run test:example:node && npm run test:example:lineman && npm run test:example:webpack && npm run test:example:babel
scripts.test:all: npm test && testem ci && npm run test:example
scripts.test:ci: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run test:all && npm run clean:dist && echo "All done!"
scripts.version:changelog: if command -v github_changelog_generator &>/dev/null; then github_changelog_generator; git commit -m "Changelog for $npm_package_version" CHANGELOG.md; else echo Versioning requires you first run 'gem install github_changelog_generator' >&2; fi
scripts.postversion: git push --tags && npm run version:changelog && git push && npm publish
scripts.version: npm run version:write && npm run compile && git add dist src/version.coffee
